name: Defense Core
description: Minimal base ontology for defense interoperability demos

concepts.name: Unit
concepts.description: Organizational element that owns platforms and assets

concepts.name: Track
concepts.description: An identified or suspected object being tracked

concepts.name: Message
concepts.description: A unit of communication exchanged over a tactical link

concepts.name: Position
concepts.description: Geospatial position including latitude, longitude, altitude

concepts.name: Platform
concepts.description: A physical asset (aircraft, ship, vehicle, sensor)

relations.name: hasPosition
relations.description: A track has an associated position

relations.name: observedAt
relations.description: A message is observed at a specific time

relations.name: belongsToUnit
relations.description: A platform belongs to a unit
